welcome_message_body: Welcome to Honmachi, Japan! Known for its historic charm, delicious cuisine, and beautiful traditional architecture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: Shiretoko Satomi (しれとこ里味)
restaurants.description: Shiretoko Satomi (しれとこ里味) is a japanese restaurant located in 斜里町.
restaurants.address: 新光町64, 斜里町, 北海道, 099-4118

restaurants.name: すし善
restaurants.description: すし善 is a sushi restaurant located in 斜里町.

restaurants.name: レッドホットチリペッパー
restaurants.description: レッドホットチリペッパー is a thai restaurant located in 斜里郡.
restaurants.address: 斜里町本町41-11, 斜里郡, 北海道

restaurants.name: お好み焼ミナミ
restaurants.description: お好み焼ミナミ is a cafe, coffee, and tea house located in the city.
restaurants.address: 斜里町本町39, 北海道, 099-4113

restaurants.name: 珍満
restaurants.description: 珍満 is a chinese restaurant located in 斜里町.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Amakusa Airfield Airport serves domestic flights within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Amakusa Airfield Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kumamoto Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kumamoto Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
